bug.short_desc: NPE adding an existing Review group

long_desc.thetext:
The following exception was seen after the following sequence:
* Remove two existing reviews groups (preferences) * Add a review group, NPE was triggered (preferences)
eclipse.buildId=M20110210-1200 java.version=1.6.0_26 java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc. BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_CA Framework arguments: -showlocation Command-line arguments: -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -showlocation
Error Tue Oct 25 19:26:06 EDT 2011 Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui.views.properties.tabbed".
